name: Demo Day Finalist: Unnatural Selection
description:
Unnatural Selection by Grace P.

Game Summary:

You play as a great white shark who does small things to help save the ocean from humanity's actions. This teaches the player to take small, daily actions to help the environment in the real world and dispels myths about marine life (like that sharks are murderous machines).

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right

  • Arrow keys to move
  • P key to pause
  • SPACE to interact with things, progress dialogue, and speed up dialogue
  • Click to choose dialogue options
